title: Brunch Burritos
instructions: Crumble or dice the planted and saut√© in a pan with olive oil until crispy and golden, about 5 minutes. Season with cumin and smoked paprika.
Scramble eggs (or plant-based egg alternative) in a separate pan until just set but still creamy.
Warm large flour tortillas in a dry pan or microwave for 15 seconds until pliable.
Layer each tortilla with the cooked planted, scrambled eggs, black beans, shredded cheese, and fresh salsa.
Fold in the sides of the tortilla, then roll tightly from the bottom to form a burrito.
Optional: Grill the burrito seam-side down in a hot pan for 1-2 minutes for a crispy exterior. Serve with sour cream and guacamole.
